greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals: A(n,k) = Sum_{p|n, p prime} p^k.
link: Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
formula: G.f. of column k: Sum_{j>=1} prime(j)^k*x^prime(j)/(1 - x^prime(j)).
mathematica: Table[Function[k, Sum[Boole[PrimeQ[d]] d^k, {d, Divisors[n]}]][i - n], {i, 0, 12}, {n, 1, i}] // Flatten
Table[Function[k, SeriesCoefficient[Sum[Prime[j]^k x^Prime[j]/(1 - x^Prime[j]), {j, 1, n}], {x, 0, n}]][i - n], {i, 0, 12}, {n, 1, i}] // Flatten
program: for(n=1, 10, for(k=0, 8, print1(T(n, k), ", ")); print); \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 26 2018
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 26 2018
